verses.verse: Now <S%G2236><s%> I say, <S%G3004><s%> That the heir, <S%G2818><s%> as long <S%G5550><s%> as he is a child, <S%G3516><s%> differs <S%G1308><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> from a servant, <S%G1401><s%> though he be lord <S%G2962><s%> of all; <S%G3956><s%>
But is under <S%G5259><s%> tutors <S%G2012><s%> and governors <S%G3623><s%> until <S%G891><s%> the time <S%G4287><s%> appointed <S%G4287><s%> of the father. <S%G3962><s%>
Even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> we, when <S%G3753><s%> we were children, <S%G3516><s%> were in bondage <S%G1402><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the elements <S%G4747><s%> of the world: <S%G2889><s%>

But when <S%G3753><s%> the fullness <S%G4138><s%> of the time <S%G5550><s%> was come, <S%G2064><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> sent <S%G1821><s%> forth <S%G1821><s%> his Son, <S%G5207><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> of a woman, <S%G1135><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%>
To redeem <S%G1805><s%> them that were under <S%G5259><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%> that we might receive <S%G618><s%> the adoption <S%G5206><s%> of sons. <S%G5206><s%>

And because <S%G3754><s%> you are sons, <S%G5207><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has sent <S%G1821><s%> forth <S%G1821><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of his Son <S%G5207><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts, <S%G2588><s%> crying, <S%G2896><s%> Abba, <S%G5><s%> Father. <S%G3962><s%>

Why <S%G5620><s%> you are <S%G1488><s%> no <S%G3765><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> a servant, <S%G1401><s%> but a son; <S%G5207><s%> and if <S%G1487><s%> a son, <S%G5207><s%> then <S%G2532><s%> an heir <S%G2818><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

However, <S%G235><s%> then, <S%G5119><s%> when you knew <S%G1492><s%> not God, <S%G2316><s%> you did service <S%G1398><s%> to them which by nature <S%G5449><s%> are no <S%G3361><s%> gods. <S%G2316><s%>

But now, <S%G3568><s%> after that you have known <S%G1097><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> or <S%G1161><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> are known <S%G1097><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> turn <S%G1994><s%> you again <S%G3825><s%> to the weak <S%G772><s%> and beggarly <S%G4434><s%> elements, <S%G4747><s%> whereunto <S%G3739><s%> you desire <S%G2309><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> <S%G509><s%> to be in bondage? <S%G1398><s%>
You observe <S%G3906><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> and months, <S%G3376><s%> and times, <S%G2540><s%> and years. <S%G1763><s%>
I am afraid <S%G5399><s%> of you, lest <S%G3381><s%> I have bestowed <S%G2872><s%> on you labor <S%G2872><s%> in vain. <S%G1500><s%>
Brothers, <S%G80><s%> I beseech <S%G1189><s%> you, be as I am; for I am as you are: you have not injured <S%G91><s%> me at <S%G3762><s%> all. <S%G3762><s%>
You know <S%G1492><s%> how <S%G3754><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> infirmity <S%G769><s%> of the flesh <S%G4561><s%> I preached <S%G2097><s%> the gospel <S%G2097><s%> to you at the first. <S%G4386><s%>

And my temptation <S%G3986><s%> which was in my flesh <S%G4561><s%> you despised <S%G1848><s%> not, nor <S%G3761><s%> rejected; <S%G1609><s%> but received <S%G1209><s%> me as an angel <S%G32><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> even as Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Where <S%G5101><s%> is then <S%G3767><s%> the blessedness <S%G3108><s%> you spoke of? for I bear <S%G3140><s%> you record, <S%G3140><s%> that, if <S%G1487><s%> it had been possible, <S%G1415><s%> you would have plucked <S%G1846><s%> out your <S%G5216><s%> own eyes, <S%G3788><s%> and have given <S%G1325><s%> them to me.
Am I therefore <S%G5620><s%> become <S%G1096><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> enemy, <S%G2190><s%> because I tell <S%G226><s%> you the truth? <S%G226><s%>
They zealously <S%G2206><s%> affect <S%G2206><s%> you, but not well; <S%G2573><s%> yes, <S%G235><s%> they would <S%G2309><s%> exclude <S%G1576><s%> you, that you might affect <S%G2206><s%> them.

But it is good <S%G2570><s%> to be zealously <S%G2206><s%> affected <S%G2206><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> in a good <S%G2570><s%> thing, and not only <S%G3440><s%> when <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> I am present <S%G3918><s%> with you.

My little <S%G5040><s%> children, <S%G5040><s%> of whom <S%G3739><s%> I travail <S%G5605><s%> in birth <S%G5605><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> until <S%G891><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be formed <S%G3445><s%> in you,
I desire <S%G2309><s%> to be present <S%G3918><s%> with you now, <S%G737><s%> and to change <S%G236><s%> my voice; <S%G5456><s%> for I stand <S%G639><s%> in doubt <S%G639><s%> of you.
Tell <S%G3004><s%> me, you that desire <S%G2309><s%> to be under <S%G5259><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%> do you not hear <S%G191><s%> the law? <S%G3551><s%>

For it is written, <S%G1125><s%> that Abraham <S%G11><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> sons, <S%G5207><s%> the one <S%G1520><s%> by a female slave, <S%G3814><s%> the other <S%G1520><s%> by a free woman. <S%G1658><s%>
But he who was of the female slave <S%G3814><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh; <S%G4561><s%> but he of the free woman <S%G1658><s%> was by promise. <S%G1860><s%>

Which <S%G3748><s%> things are an allegory: <S%G238><s%> for these <S%G3778><s%> are the two <S%G1417><s%> covenants; <S%G1242><s%> the one <S%G3391><s%> from the mount <S%G3735><s%> Sinai, <S%G4614><s%> which engenders <S%G1080><s%> to bondage, <S%G1397><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> is Agar. <S%G28><s%>

For this <S%G3588><s%> Agar <S%G28><s%> is mount <S%G3735><s%> Sinai <S%G4614><s%> in Arabia, <S%G688><s%> and answers <S%G4960><s%> to Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> is, and is in bondage <S%G1398><s%> with her children. <S%G5043><s%>
But Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> which is above <S%G507><s%> is free, <S%G1658><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> is the mother <S%G3384><s%> of us all. <S%G3956><s%>

For it is written, <S%G1125><s%> Rejoice, <S%G2165><s%> you barren <S%G4723><s%> that bore <S%G5088><s%> not; break <S%G4486><s%> forth <S%G4486><s%> and cry, <S%G994><s%> you that travail <S%G5605><s%> not: for the desolate <S%G2048><s%> has many <S%G4183><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> she which has <S%G2192><s%> an husband. <S%G435><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> we, brothers, <S%G80><s%> as Isaac <S%G2464><s%> was, are the children <S%G5043><s%> of promise. <S%G1860><s%>

But as then <S%G5119><s%> he that was born <S%G1080><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> persecuted <S%G1377><s%> him that was born after <S%G2596><s%> the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> it is now. <S%G3568><s%>

Nevertheless <S%G235><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> the scripture? <S%G1124><s%> Cast <S%G1544><s%> out the female slave <S%G3814><s%> and her son: <S%G5207><s%> for the son <S%G5207><s%> of the female slave <S%G3814><s%> shall not be heir <S%G2816><s%> with the son <S%G5207><s%> of the free woman. <S%G1658><s%>
So <S%G686><s%> then, <S%G686><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> we are not children <S%G5043><s%> of the female slave, <S%G3814><s%> but of the free. <S%G1658><s%>
